comment: Make sure you remember to keep up with the ZyBooks!
Pay attention in class; the homeworks are very similar to the in-class assignments.
There are practice problems in the book that will help with the written homeworks.
Pay attention and take good notes.
Do the optional in class assignments, they are very similar to the homeworks.
Go to class; everything on the exam is talked about in class.
Do the readings! They are on the exam!
Pay attention in class and you should be good.
The final paper is most of your grade, so make sure you do your best on it.
I highly suggest going to the Writing and Communication Consultants if you need help with your paper.
Do the readings! The exam is based on them.
Go to SI sessions if you are struggling.
Take this class at Iowa Western.
Go to office hours and get a tutor if you're struggling.
Do the practice quizzes and watch Steve Butler's videos.
